description: Key milestones and events in the development and implementation of the NIH Human Virome Program

milestones.milestone: Public Workshop on Human Virome Concept
milestones.description: Initial public workshop to gather input from scientific community on the concept of a human virome initiative
Formal presentation of the Human Virome Program concept to the NIH Division of Program Coordination, Planning, and Strategic Initiatives Council of Councils
Publication of funding opportunity announcements for Virome Characterization Centers and Functional Studies projects
Informational webinar for potential applicants to explain program goals and application requirements
Announcement of grant awards for VCCs and Functional Studies projects
Initial consortium-wide meeting to establish collaborative framework (3 months after awards)
Protocol standardization and harmonization across all research sites
Development of technologies, methodologies, and data infrastructure
Peak period of sample collection and processing across all projects
Integration and analysis of data across projects, preparation of major publications
Completion of initial phase of Human Virome Program with comprehensive data release and assessment of outcomes
